metering: 63-zone TTL full-aperture metering * Evaluative metering (linkable to  any AF point) * Partial metering (approx. 9% of viewfinder at center) *  Spot metering (approx. 4% of viewfinder at center) * Center-weighted average  metering
shutterspeeds: 1/4000 sec. to 30 sec., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range  varies by shooting mode)
wideanglelens: Product Description This is a hi-definition black digital wide angle lens  with macro. This lens features 0.45x professional high speed auto focus. This  lens comes with a 10 year warranty.
selftimer: 10-sec. or 2-sec. delay or 10-sec. delay plus continuous  shooting
filesize: (1) Large/Fine: Approx. 6.4MB (5184 x 3456 pixels) (2) Large/Normal:  Approx. 3.2MB (5184 x 3456 pixels) (3) Medium/Fine: Approx. 3.4MB (3456 x  2304 pixels) (4) Medium/Normal: Approx. 1.7MB (3456 x 2304 pixels) (5)  Small/Fine: Approx. 2.2MB (2592 x 1728 pixels) (6) Small/Normal: Approx.  1.1MB (2592 x 1728 pixels) (7) RAW: Approx. 24.5MB (5184 x 3456  pixels) Exact file sizes depend on the subject, ISO speed, Picture Style,  etc.
sensor: High-sensitivity, high-resolution, large single-plate CMOS sensor, 22.3mm  x 14.9mm (APS-C size)
burstcapability: Max. 3.7 shots/sec. (with One-Shot AF or AI Servo  AF)
fileformats: Still: JPEG, RAW (14-bit, Canon original), RAW+JPEG Video: MOV (Image  data: H.264, Audio: Linear PCM)
remotecontrol: Possible with optional Remote Switch RS-60E3 and Remote Controller  RC-1/RC-5/RC-6
exposuremodes: (1) Program AE (shiftable) (2) Shutter-priority AE (3)  Aperture-priority AE (4) Depth-of-field AE (A-DEP, non-shiftable) (5) Full  Auto (Program AE, non-shiftable) (6) Programmed Image Control modes (6  modes) (7) Manual exposure (including bulb) (8) E-TTL II autoflash program  AE
whitebalance: Auto, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten Light, White Fluorescent Light,  Flash, Custom
